languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, без хормейстера астропаты Даргонуса существенно потеряют силу. Нельзя казнить мастера Праса без достойной замены". {n}Сенешаль хмурится.{/n} "За одним из миров Чорда числится давний долг, который можно взыскать опытным астропатом. Мы можем затребовать выплату, но тогда та планета останется почти без средств связи".
languages.translation_comment: В финальном суде поставить аддов с мира Чорда или переписать под наш мир
В финальном суде поставить аддов с мира Чорда или переписать под наш мир

languages.text: "Lord Captain, without a Choirmaster, the power of Dargonus's Astropaths would be significantly diminished. Unless a worthy replacement is found for Master Pras, he cannot be executed." {n}The Seneschal frowns.{/n} "There is a Chorda world that owes us an old debt which can be repaid with a seasoned Astropath. We can make the request, although it would leave the planet in question with barely any means of communication."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, без хормейстера астропаты Даргонуса существенно потеряют силу. Нельзя казнить мастера Праса без достойной замены". {n}Сенешаль хмурится.{/n} "За одним из миров Чорда числится давний долг, который можно взыскать опытным астропатом. Мы можем затребовать выплату, но тогда та планета останется почти без средств связи".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ohne einen Chormeister würde die Macht der Astropathen auf Dargonus stark eingeschränkt. Bis wir einen würdigen Nachfolger für Meister Pras gefunden haben, darf er nicht exekutiert werden." {n}Der Truchsess runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Es gibt da eine Chorda-Welt, die eine alte Schuld uns gegenüber mit einem erfahrenen Astropathen begleichen könnte. Wir können die Anfrage gerne stellen, wobei der fragliche Planet dadurch von jeder Kommunikation abgeschnitten wäre."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, without a Choirmaster, the power of Dargonus's Astropaths would be significantly diminished. Unless a worthy replacement is found for Master Pras, he cannot be executed." {n}The Seneschal frowns.{/n} "There is a Chorda world that owes us an old debt which can be repaid with a seasoned Astropath. We can make the request, although it would leave the planet in question with barely any means of communication."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ohne einen Chormeister würde die Macht der Astropathen auf Dargonus stark eingeschränkt. Bis wir einen würdigen Nachfolger für Meister Pras gefunden haben, darf er nicht exekutiert werden." {n}Der Truchsess runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Es gibt da eine Chorda-Welt, die eine alte Schuld uns gegenüber mit einem erfahrenen Astropathen begleichen könnte. Wir können die Anfrage gerne stellen, wobei der fragliche Planet dadurch von jeder Kommunikation abgeschnitten wäre."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, sans maître de chœur, le pouvoir des astropathes de Dargonus se trouvera considérablement diminué. À moins de lui trouver un remplaçant à la hauteur, nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre d'exécuter maître Pras. » {n}Le sénéchal fronce les sourcils d'un air songeur.{/n} « Cela étant dit, l'un des mondes de Chorda a une vieille dette envers nous, une dette dont il pourrait s'acquitter en nous envoyant un astropathe chevronné. Nous pouvons toujours en faire la demande, même si la planète en question se verrait alors privée de son principal moyen de communication. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, without a Choirmaster, the power of Dargonus's Astropaths would be significantly diminished. Unless a worthy replacement is found for Master Pras, he cannot be executed." {n}The Seneschal frowns.{/n} "There is a Chorda world that owes us an old debt which can be repaid with a seasoned Astropath. We can make the request, although it would leave the planet in question with barely any means of communication."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, sans maître de chœur, le pouvoir des astropathes de Dargonus se trouvera considérablement diminué. À moins de lui trouver un remplaçant à la hauteur, nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre d'exécuter maître Pras. » {n}Le sénéchal fronce les sourcils d'un air songeur.{/n} « Cela étant dit, l'un des mondes de Chorda a une vieille dette envers nous, une dette dont il pourrait s'acquitter en nous envoyant un astropathe chevronné. Nous pouvons toujours en faire la demande, même si la planète en question se verrait alors privée de son principal moyen de communication. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，若是失去了唱诗大师，达戈努斯的星语唱诗班便会群龙无首。除非我们能找到另一位可靠的人选代替普拉斯大师，否则我们决不能让那些人把他处决。”{n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。{/n}“库尔达的某个世界之前欠过我们一笔旧债。我们可以让他们提供经验丰富的星语者，以此偿还债务，不过这样一来，那颗行星便几乎等同于失去了所有通信手段。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, without a Choirmaster, the power of Dargonus's Astropaths would be significantly diminished. Unless a worthy replacement is found for Master Pras, he cannot be executed." {n}The Seneschal frowns.{/n} "There is a Chorda world that owes us an old debt which can be repaid with a seasoned Astropath. We can make the request, although it would leave the planet in question with barely any means of communication."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，若是失去了唱诗大师，达戈努斯的星语唱诗班便会群龙无首。除非我们能找到另一位可靠的人选代替普拉斯大师，否则我们决不能让那些人把他处决。”{n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。{/n}“库尔达的某个世界之前欠过我们一笔旧债。我们可以让他们提供经验丰富的星语者，以此偿还债务，不过这样一来，那颗行星便几乎等同于失去了所有通信手段。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, sin un maestro del Coro, el poder de los Astrópatas de Dargonus quedaría gravemente limitado. A menos que se encuentre un reemplazo digno para el maestro Pras, no podemos ejecutarlo». {n}El Senescal frunce el ceño.{/n} «Hay un mundo de Chorda que nos debe una vieja deuda; podría pagarla con un Astrópata veterano. Podemos realizar la solicitud, aunque arrebataría al planeta en cuestión de casi todas sus formas de comunicación».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, without a Choirmaster, the power of Dargonus's Astropaths would be significantly diminished. Unless a worthy replacement is found for Master Pras, he cannot be executed." {n}The Seneschal frowns.{/n} "There is a Chorda world that owes us an old debt which can be repaid with a seasoned Astropath. We can make the request, although it would leave the planet in question with barely any means of communication."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, sin un maestro del Coro, el poder de los Astrópatas de Dargonus quedaría gravemente limitado. A menos que se encuentre un reemplazo digno para el maestro Pras, no podemos ejecutarlo». {n}El Senescal frunce el ceño.{/n} «Hay un mundo de Chorda que nos debe una vieja deuda; podría pagarla con un Astrópata veterano. Podemos realizar la solicitud, aunque arrebataría al planeta en cuestión de casi todas sus formas de comunicación».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、クワイアーマスターなしでは、ダルゴナスの感応通信官の能力は大きく損なわれてしまいます。マスター・プラスの代わりとなるに値する者が見つからない限り、彼を処刑することはできません」{n}家令長は眉をひそめた。{/n}「かつての貸しのある惑星チョーダがございます。熟練の感応通信官でその借りを返させることができます。ただし、惑星は通信手段をほとんど失うことになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, without a Choirmaster, the power of Dargonus's Astropaths would be significantly diminished. Unless a worthy replacement is found for Master Pras, he cannot be executed." {n}The Seneschal frowns.{/n} "There is a Chorda world that owes us an old debt which can be repaid with a seasoned Astropath. We can make the request, although it would leave the planet in question with barely any means of communication."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、クワイアーマスターなしでは、ダルゴナスの感応通信官の能力は大きく損なわれてしまいます。マスター・プラスの代わりとなるに値する者が見つからない限り、彼を処刑することはできません」{n}家令長は眉をひそめた。{/n}「かつての貸しのある惑星チョーダがございます。熟練の感応通信官でその借りを返させることができます。ただし、惑星は通信手段をほとんど失うことになるでしょう」

languages.text: "Başlarında bir Koro Şefi olmazsa Dargonus Astropatlarının gücü büyük ölçüde azalacaktır Lord Kaptan. Üstat Pras'ın yerini almaya layık biri bulunmadan idam edilemez." {n}Seneşal kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Epeydir alacaklısı olduğumuz bir Chorda dünyası var... Kıdemli bir Astropat karşılığında o borcu silebiliriz. Gerçi bu durumda söz konusu gezegen, neredeyse tüm iletişim araçlarından mahrum kalmış olur."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, without a Choirmaster, the power of Dargonus's Astropaths would be significantly diminished. Unless a worthy replacement is found for Master Pras, he cannot be executed." {n}The Seneschal frowns.{/n} "There is a Chorda world that owes us an old debt which can be repaid with a seasoned Astropath. We can make the request, although it would leave the planet in question with barely any means of communication."

traits.locale_text: "Başlarında bir Koro Şefi olmazsa Dargonus Astropatlarının gücü büyük ölçüde azalacaktır Lord Kaptan. Üstat Pras'ın yerini almaya layık biri bulunmadan idam edilemez." {n}Seneşal kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Epeydir alacaklısı olduğumuz bir Chorda dünyası var... Kıdemli bir Astropat karşılığında o borcu silebiliriz, derim. Gerçi bu durumda söz konusu gezegen, neredeyse tüm iletişim araçlarından mahrum kalmış olur."
